description: Creates an association between an approval rule template and one or more specified repositories.

parameters.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template you want to associate with one or more repositories.

parameters.name: repositoryNames
parameters.description: The names of the repositories you want to associate with the template. (string) ---

nested_items.name: associatedRepositoryNames
nested_items.description: A list of names of the repositories that have been associated with the template.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of any errors that might have occurred while attempting to create the association between the template and the repositories.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository where the association was not made.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: An error code that specifies whether the repository name was not valid or not found.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message that provides details about why the repository name was not found or not valid.
